creator: Dubai Smart Government
descriptionHtml:
DubaiNow is the first and only Dubai Government application that provides you access to more than 115 government and private sector services from over 34 entities.
Our aim is to offer you a one-stop experience for all your Government interactions, available seamlessly and safely at your finger-tips. We are always adding more services to ease your life.

DubaiNow services enable you to:

Pay Your Bills:
Pay your DEWA, Etisalat, Du, FEWA, Empower and Dubai Municipality bills and fees
Top up your Salik, NOL, and Dubai Customs accounts

Manage All Things Driving:
View and pay all your traffic fines
Renew your car registration
Top up your Salik account as well as update your Salik information, and view and dispute violations
Pay for parking anywhere in the city
Pay for petrol at ENOC stations, and top up your ENOC VIP account
Purchase and manage your seasonal parking
Buy or sell your Dubai car
Purchase and renew your car insurance
View real time information on the locations of traffic accidents
Find locations of Tasjeel centers, EV chargers and fuel stations

Manage All Things Housing:
Pay your DEWA bills
View your DEWA accounts, invoices and receipts as well as download your DEWA bills
View your DEWA consumption details
Activate your DEWA account when you move into a new home
Sign a tenancy contract and get your Ejari
View the status of your Ejari contract
View and manage the properties that you own and rent
View the Rent Increase Calculator from RERA
Order services for your home such as moving, painting and cleaning
Apply to activate phone, internet and TV connections through du
Verify any Dubai title deed
View property listings from Simsari and Dubai Asset Management
View and apply to Mohammed bin Rashid Housing Establishment, use their loan calculator and request a To Whom It May Concern letter

Manage All Things Residency:
Get, renew, or cancel residency sponsorship for your spouse and children
View all residency visas and entry permits of your dependents
Track the status of visa applications and entry permits for residents and visitors
Request and receive official travel and dependent reports from GDRFA

Manage All Things Health:
View and manage your and your family’s medical appointments, lab results and prescriptions.
Keep track of your child’s vaccination plan
Find all doctors including visiting doctors, clinics and hospitals registered with Dubai Health Authority (DHA)
Find pharmacies around you including 24-hour pharmacies

Manage All Things Education:
Browse the official KHDA school directory and filter by school name, rating, annual fees, curriculum, level, location and more
View and sign the KHDA parent-school contract instantly
Apply and receive the KHDA academic history of your children
Browse the official Dubai university directory
Search for training institutes in Dubai and view their details

All Things Related to Police and Security:
Apply for a Police Clearance Certificate from Dubai Police
Find the nearest Dubai Police Station and select the fastest route
Inquire about the status of Dubai Court cases
Call emergency numbers such as Dubai Police, Ambulance, Fire Department, and DEWA

All Things Travel:
Check real time flight information from Dubai Airport and watchlist flights of interest.
Submit lost and found claims to Dubai Airport

All Things Islam:
View daily prayer timings
Find your nearest mosque and select the fastest route
During Ramadan, you can pay for Zakat and Iftar meals and view a countdown Imsakia

All Things Donations:
Donate to all the following charities and causes:
Dubai Cares, Noor Dubai, Dar Al Ber, Suqia, Inmates, Beit Al Kheir, AWQAF, Al Jalila and more

And More:
Create your own digital business card and share it seamlessly as a vCard or QR Code
View the official Dubai Sports Calendar from Dubai Sports Council, and select your favorite sport to receive notifications
View Dubai Calendar
Find your nearest ATM and view the fastest route to reach it
descriptionShort: App is for individuals of Dubai, giving them easy access to government services

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Thank you for being a loyal DubaiNow customer.

With this release we are proud to introduce our new design. Don’t worry all your favorite services are still there; they just look sharper and more pristine.

As usual, we have also done some enhancements and bug fixes to make sure you are getting the best of DubaiNow.

Hope you are staying home and staying safe.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We have added new functionalities to your profile:
- You can now sync your DubaiNow profile with UAE PASS if you login with UAE PASS.
- You can change the language of the communications you receive from us.
- You can also deactivate your account, although we are sure you would not want to.

We have done some miscellaneous bug fixes and improvements.

Thank you for being a loyal DubaiNow user and hope you are staying safe.

- You can also deactivate your account, although we are sure you would not want to.

We have done some miscellaneous bug fixes and improvements.

Thank you for being a loyal DubaiNow user and hope you are staying safe.

title: DubaiNow

creator: Dubai Smart Government
descriptionHtml:
DubaiNow is the first and only Dubai Government application that provides you access to more than 115 government and private sector services from over 34 entities.
Our aim is to offer you a one-stop experience for all your Government interactions, available seamlessly and safely at your finger-tips. We are always adding more services to ease your life.

DubaiNow services enable you to:

Pay Your Bills:
Pay your DEWA, Etisalat, Du, FEWA, Empower and Dubai Municipality bills and fees
Top up your Salik, NOL, and Dubai Customs accounts

Manage All Things Driving:
View and pay all your traffic fines
Renew your car registration
Top up your Salik account as well as update your Salik information, and view and dispute violations
Pay for parking anywhere in the city
Pay for petrol at ENOC stations, and top up your ENOC VIP account
Purchase and manage your seasonal parking
Buy or sell your Dubai car
Purchase and renew your car insurance
View real time information on the locations of traffic accidents
Find locations of Tasjeel centers, EV chargers and fuel stations

Manage All Things Housing:
Pay your DEWA bills
View your DEWA accounts, invoices and receipts as well as download your DEWA bills
View your DEWA consumption details
Activate your DEWA account when you move into a new home
Sign a tenancy contract and get your Ejari
View the status of your Ejari contract
View and manage the properties that you own and rent
View the Rent Increase Calculator from RERA
Order services for your home such as moving, painting and cleaning
Apply to activate phone, internet and TV connections through du
Verify any Dubai title deed
View property listings from Simsari and Dubai Asset Management
View and apply to Mohammed bin Rashid Housing Establishment, use their loan calculator and request a To Whom It May Concern letter

Manage All Things Residency:
Get, renew, or cancel residency sponsorship for your direct family dependents
View all residency visas and entry permits of your dependents
Track the status of visa applications and entry permits for residents and visitors
Request and receive official travel and dependent reports from GDRFA

Manage All Things Health:
View and manage your and your family’s medical appointments, lab results and prescriptions.
Keep track of vaccination plan
Find all doctors including visiting doctors, clinics and hospitals registered with Dubai Health Authority (DHA)
Find pharmacies around you including 24-hour pharmacies

Manage All Things Education:
Browse the official KHDA school directory and filter by school name, rating, annual fees, curriculum, level, location and more
View and sign the KHDA parent-school contract instantly
Apply and receive the KHDA academic history
Browse the official Dubai university directory
Search for training institutes in Dubai and view their details

All Things Related to Police and Security:
Apply for a Police Clearance Certificate from Dubai Police
Find the nearest Dubai Police Station and select the fastest route
Inquire about the status of Dubai Court cases
Call emergency numbers such as Dubai Police, Ambulance, Fire Department, and DEWA

All Things Travel:
Check real time flight information from Dubai Airport and watchlist flights of interest.
Submit lost and found claims to Dubai Airport

All Things Islam:
View daily prayer timings
Find your nearest mosque and select the fastest route
During Ramadan, you can pay for Zakat and Iftar meals and view a countdown Imsakia

All Things Donations:
Donate to all the following charities and causes:
Dubai Cares, Noor Dubai, Dar Al Ber, Suqia, Inmates, Beit Al Kheir, AWQAF, Al Jalila and more

And More:
Create your own digital business card and share it seamlessly as a vCard or QR Code
View the official Dubai Sports Calendar from Dubai Sports Council, and select your favorite sport to receive notifications
View Dubai Calendar
Find your nearest ATM and view the fastest route to reach it
descriptionShort: App is for individuals of Dubai, giving them easy access to government services

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We have introduced the new Premarital Service. This service enables you to do the mandated premarital test from Dubai Health Authority (DHA). You can book the appointment, pay the fees, get the result and even view your marriage certificate once its issued from Dubai Courts.

We have also done some miscellaneous enhancements and minor bug fixes.

Thanks for being a loyal DubaiNow customer and we hope that you are keeping safe.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Ramadan Kareem, we have activated Iftar and Zakat Al Fitr services in order to allow you to pay your Zakat and donate Iftar meals during the holy month. All are in partnership with Dar Al Ber.

This year we have partnered with Zakat Fund and added the Zakat on Money service, allowing you to pay Zakat on your savings through the app as well.

You can also check the Ramadan timings with the Imsakia service.

Thank you for being a loyal DubaiNow customer and hope you are keeping safe.

Our aim is to offer you a one-stop experience for all your Government interactions, available seamlessly and safely at your finger-tips. We are always adding more services to ease your life.

DubaiNow services enable you to:

Pay Your Bills:
Pay your DEWA, Etisalat, Du, FEWA, Empower and Dubai Municipality bills and fees
Top up your Salik, NOL, and Dubai Customs accounts

Manage All Things Driving:
View and pay all your traffic fines
Renew your car registration
Top up your Salik account as well as update your Salik information, and view and dispute violations
Pay for parking anywhere in the city
Pay for petrol at ENOC stations, and top up your ENOC VIP account
Purchase and manage your seasonal parking
Buy or sell your Dubai car
Purchase and renew your car insurance
View real time information on the locations of traffic accidents
Find locations of Tasjeel centers, EV chargers and fuel stations

Manage All Things Housing:
Pay your DEWA bills
View your DEWA accounts, invoices and receipts as well as download your DEWA bills
View your DEWA consumption details
Activate your DEWA account when you move into a new home
Sign a tenancy contract and get your Ejari
View the status of your Ejari contract
View and manage the properties that you own and rent
View the Rent Increase Calculator from RERA
Order services for your home such as moving, painting and cleaning
Apply to activate phone, internet and TV connections through du
Verify any Dubai title deed
View property listings from Simsari and Dubai Asset Management
View and apply to Mohammed bin Rashid Housing Establishment, use their loan calculator and request a To Whom It May Concern letter

Manage All Things Residency:
Get, renew, or cancel residency sponsorship for your direct family dependents
View all residency visas and entry permits of your dependents
Track the status of visa applications and entry permits for residents and visitors
Request and receive official travel and dependent reports from GDRFA

Manage All Things Health:
View and manage your and your family’s medical appointments, lab results and prescriptions.
Keep track of vaccination plan
Find all doctors including visiting doctors, clinics and hospitals registered with Dubai Health Authority (DHA)
Find pharmacies around you including 24-hour pharmacies

Manage All Things Education:
Browse the official KHDA school directory and filter by school name, rating, annual fees, curriculum, level, location and more
View and sign the KHDA parent-school contract instantly
Apply and receive the KHDA academic history
Browse the official Dubai university directory
Search for training institutes in Dubai and view their details

All Things Related to Police and Security:
Apply for a Police Clearance Certificate from Dubai Police
Find the nearest Dubai Police Station and select the fastest route
Inquire about the status of Dubai Court cases
Call emergency numbers such as Dubai Police, Ambulance, Fire Department, and DEWA

All Things Travel:
Check real time flight information from Dubai Airport and watchlist flights of interest.
Submit lost and found claims to Dubai Airport

All Things Islam:
View daily prayer timings
Find your nearest mosque and select the fastest route
During Ramadan, you can pay for Zakat and Iftar meals and view a countdown Imsakia

All Things Donations:
Donate to all the following charities and causes:
Dubai Cares, Noor Dubai, Dar Al Ber, Suqia, Inmates, Beit Al Kheir, AWQAF, Al Jalila and more

And More:
Create your own digital business card and share it seamlessly as a vCard or QR Code
View the official Dubai Sports Calendar from Dubai Sports Council, and select your favorite sport to receive notifications
View Dubai Calendar
Find your nearest ATM and view the fastest route to reach it
descriptionShort: App is for individuals of Dubai, giving them easy access to government services

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- We have updated the residency services with new user experience.
- There are also some minor improvements and miscellaneous bug fixes.

Thank you for being a loyal DubaiNow customer and we hope you are staying safe.

Thank you for being a loyal DubaiNow customer and we hope you are staying safe.

title: DubaiNow

creator: Dubai Smart Government
descriptionHtml:
DubaiNow is the first and only Dubai Government application that provides you access to more than 130 government and private sector services from over 34 entities.
Our aim is to offer you a one-stop experience for all your Government interactions, available seamlessly and safely at your finger-tips. We are always adding more services to ease your life.

DubaiNow services enable you to:

Pay Your Bills:
Pay your DEWA, Etisalat, Du, FEWA, Empower and Dubai Municipality bills and fees
Top up your Salik, NOL, and Dubai Customs accounts

Manage All Things Driving:
View and pay all your traffic fines
Renew your car registration
Top up your Salik account as well as update your Salik information, and view and dispute violations
Pay for parking anywhere in the city
Pay for petrol at ENOC stations, and top up your ENOC VIP account
Purchase and manage your seasonal parking
Buy or sell your Dubai car
Purchase and renew your car insurance
View real time information on the locations of traffic accidents
Find locations of Tasjeel centers, EV chargers and fuel stations

Manage All Things Housing:
Pay your DEWA bills
View your DEWA accounts, invoices and receipts as well as download your DEWA bills
View your DEWA consumption details
Activate your DEWA account when you move into a new home
Sign a tenancy contract and get your Ejari
View the status of your Ejari contract
View and manage the properties that you own and rent
View the Rent Increase Calculator from RERA
Order services for your home such as moving, painting and cleaning
Apply to activate phone, internet and TV connections through du
Verify any Dubai title deed
View property listings from Simsari and Dubai Asset Management
View and apply to Mohammed bin Rashid Housing Establishment, use their loan calculator and request a To Whom It May Concern letter

Manage All Things Residency:
Get, renew, or cancel residency sponsorship for your direct family dependents
View all residency visas and entry permits of your dependents
Track the status of visa applications and entry permits for residents and visitors
Request and receive official travel and dependent reports from GDRFA

Manage All Things Health:
View and manage your and your family’s medical appointments, lab results and prescriptions.
Keep track of vaccination plan
Find all doctors including visiting doctors, clinics and hospitals registered with Dubai Health Authority (DHA)
Find pharmacies around you including 24-hour pharmacies

Manage All Things Education:
Browse the official KHDA school directory and filter by school name, rating, annual fees, curriculum, level, location and more
View and sign the KHDA parent-school contract instantly
Apply and receive the KHDA academic history
Browse the official Dubai university directory
Search for training institutes in Dubai and view their details

All Things Related to Police and Security:
Apply for a Police Clearance Certificate from Dubai Police
Find the nearest Dubai Police Station and select the fastest route
Inquire about the status of Dubai Court cases
Call emergency numbers such as Dubai Police, Ambulance, Fire Department, and DEWA

All Things Travel:
Check real time flight information from Dubai Airport and watchlist flights of interest.
Submit lost and found claims to Dubai Airport

All Things Islam:
View daily prayer timings
Find your nearest mosque and select the fastest route
During Ramadan, you can pay for Zakat and Iftar meals and view a countdown Imsakia

All Things Donations:
Donate to all the following charities and causes:
Dubai Cares, Noor Dubai, Dar Al Ber, Suqia, Inmates, Beit Al Kheir, AWQAF, Al Jalila and more

And More:
Create your own digital business card and share it seamlessly as a vCard or QR Code
View the official Dubai Sports Calendar from Dubai Sports Council, and select your favorite sport to receive notifications
View Dubai Calendar
Find your nearest ATM and view the fastest route to reach it
descriptionShort: App is for individuals of Dubai, giving them easy access to government services

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Ramadan Kareem, we have activated Iftar and Zakat Al Fitr services in order to allow you to pay your Zakat and donate Iftar meals during the holy month. All are in partnership with Dar Al Ber.

This year we continue to add our voice to the “1 Billion Meals campaign” by allowing you to contribute through DubaiNow.

You can also check the Ramadan timings with the Imsakia service.

Thank you for being a loyal DubaiNow customer and hope you are keeping safe.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We have added more services that will add value.

For Dubai Citizens you can now request all your maintenance from MBRHE, request pest control services from DM and also view list of authorized contractors from DM.
You can also get and view your Bunyan card from DM and DEWA inflation under “benefits and offers”.

For our senior citizens, the Thukher club can now be accessed through DubaiNow.
